#include<iostream>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
  int T,c[41];
  char A[41][100];
  cin>>T;
  for(int i=0;i<T;i++)
    cin>>A[i];
  for(int i=0;i<T;i++)
    c[i]=0;
  for(int i=0;i<T;i++)
    for(int j=0;A[i][j]!='\0';j++)
        if(A[i][j] == 'A')
            c[i]++;
        else if(A[i][j] == 'B')
            c[i]+=2;
        else if(A[i][j] == 'D')
            c[i]++;
        else if(A[i][j] == 'O')
            c[i]++;
        else if(A[i][j] == 'P')
            c[i]++;
        else if(A[i][j] == 'R')
            c[i]++;
        else if(A[i][j] == 'Q')
            c[i]++;
  for(int i=0;i<T;i++)
  cout<<"\n"<<c[i];
  return 0;
  }
